Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Performance optimizations: indexes, parallel queries, and reduced data fetching

- Added database indexes to Hangout, HangoutSuggestion, PupFriendship, Pup, and HangoutNote models
- Optimized bootstrap API with parallel queries and select statements
- Optimized approvals page with select statements to reduce data fetched
- Optimized manage page with parallel fetch for user and friends data
- Added take limits to home page queries to prevent over-fetching
- Added pagination support to pups API endpoint
- Combined validation queries in hangout PATCH endpoint with Promise.all
- Replaced window.location.reload\(\) with router.refresh\(\) in ManageClient
- Added compress and poweredByHeader settings to Next.js config

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Home page redesign: action-focused layout with role-based views

Redesigned the home/landing page to be more action-focused with different
layouts for owners and friends. Key changes:

- Added rotating fun welcome messages using pup names
- Owners see: pending suggestions, upcoming hangouts, pups with "Create Hangout"
- Friends see: available hangouts, their assignments/suggestions, pups with "Suggest Time"
- All hangout cards are clickable and open EventDetailsModal
- All pup cards link to appropriate action pages \(create hangout or suggest time\)
- Removed redundant Quick Actions grid \(actions now on pup cards\)
- Mobile-first responsive design with compact cards

New components created in app/components/home/:
- FunMessage.tsx: Hook for random welcome messages
- HangoutListCard.tsx: Clickable hangout list item
- SuggestionPreviewCard.tsx: Pending suggestion preview
- PupActionCard.tsx: Pup card with action overlay

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add WhatsApp notifications for hangout assign/unassign

- Add generateHangoutUnassignedMessage template for when friend cancels
- Update assign route to notify owner when friend takes a hangout
- Update unassign route to notify owner when friend cancels
